text: DoD News Channel was a television channel. It broadcast military news and information for the 2.6 million members of the U.S. Armed Forces. It was founded in 2004 as The Pentagon Channel. The channel ceased operations on April 17, 2015. However, content will still be produced for the American Forces Network and the website Defense.gov. Category:American television channels Category:2004 establishments in the United States Category:2015 disestablishments in the United States
title: DoD News Channel
